moves.name: Endeavor
moves.description: An attack move that cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

moves.name: Rolling Kick
moves.description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Triple Kick
moves.description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each  successive hit.

moves.name: Rapid Spin
moves.description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

moves.name: Counter
moves.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Feint
moves.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Wide Guard
moves.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

moves.name: Quick Guard
moves.description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

moves.name: Detect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
